emotions.summary: Tree trunks grow however makes them happy. All kinds of happy little splashes. I can't think of anything more rewarding than being able to express yourself to others through painting. Take your time.

This is truly an almighty mountain. Now let's put some happy little clouds in here. I started painting as a hobby when I was little. I didn't know I had any talent. I believe talent is just a pursued

There he comes. Even trees need a friend. We all need friends. Trees grow in all kinds of ways. They're not all perfectly straight. Not every limb is perfect. Just think about these things in your mind

You can do it. You can't make a mistake. Anything that happens you can learn to use - and make something beautiful out of it. Let your imagination be your guide. When you do it your way you can go anywhere

There is immense joy in just watching - watching all the little creatures in nature. Let's put some happy trees and bushes back in here. This is a happy place, little squirrels live here and play. Mountains are

Everyone needs a friend. Friends are the most valuable things in the world. We'll put a happy little sky in here. Use absolutely no pressure. Just like an angel's wing. Only God can make a tree - but you can paint
